function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased health issues due to indoor air pollution","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases, respiratory problems, and other health issues","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective indoor air quality monitoring systems","Technologies":"Wireless Sensor Network (WSN), Internet of Things (IoT)","People":"Building occupants, residents, researchers","Owner":"Researchers, building owners, technology developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor air quality parameters","Impact":"Risk of exposure to harmful pollutants, lack of awareness of unhealthy indoor environment","Mitigation":"Development of advanced sensor networks and automatic alert systems","Technologies":"Zig-Bee sensor network, communication protocols, online access systems","People":"Building occupants, residents, environmental health professionals","Owner":"Researchers, environmental health professionals, technology developers"},{"Description":"Inaccurate monitoring of IAQ parameters","Impact":"Failure to detect harmful pollutants, inability to address indoor air quality issues effectively","Mitigation":"Improved accuracy of monitored parameters, reduction of power consumption","Technologies":"Sensor network architecture, data analysis protocols","People":"Building occupants, residents, environmental health professionals","Owner":"Researchers, technology developers"}]}
